title: Odoru Mowai-kun
synopsis: The anime centers on a Moai statue named Mowai-kun who is gloomy every day because it lives a dull life where it just watches the beach and the sun from atop a hill on an island. But one day Mowai-kun grows arms, and starts to dance. The anime will air within the Oha-Suta program's "Kyara-Suta" corner.
staff: [['Yusa, Kazushige', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Series Composition']], ['Koguma', ['Sound Director', ' Music']], ['Paisley Parks', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Arrangement']]]
